Name: Way of the Orb
About the game: Way of the Orb is the ultimate VR orb-blocking game! Kill monsters, upgrade weapons, and hunt down bosses with your orb-blocking skills! Orbs fly at you in different shapes making on-the-fly puzzles. Choose between a staff, sword, or shield to defend yourself and defeat the monsters!
